data.text: @SraSpanglish Congrats to your county on their efforts to get it so low! We’ve been teaching this whole school year without masks. Every once in awhile when there’s a spike after coming back from breaks, I mask up but it’s been great!
@SraSpanglish @klasekastellano I didn’t know that! My son lives in Raleigh and it wasn’t like that at all.
@SraSpanglish We are maskless on Tuesday but not risking it. Too many people aren’t healthy or have underlying issues.  Protecting them and myself. One day but today is not different than Tuesday.
@K_Griffith @klasekastellano Girl, not in Gaston County. They walk a straight party line regardless of evidence most of the time.
@SraSpanglish @klasekastellano Aren’t you in NC? I thought they had decent mask guidelines.
@K_Griffith Actually, not as weird as I thought, it turns out!
@klasekastellano Wow. My county went maskless in December and STAYED maskless while they were up to FORTY PERCENT while I was with Dad 🤦🏼🤦🏼🤦🏼🤦🏼🤦🏼
@SraSpanglish We are maskless in Monday. Our city is at .8%
@SraSpanglish Your voice is much stronger than you remember! I startled myself a few times
@SraSpanglish I wish you luck, success, and happiness
